name.name: Developmental Resting State fMRI and Structrual Sample 10-26 yo

software.description:
Eyes closed 5 min rest and structural 1.5 TR 3T Siemens Trio in developmenetal sample 10-26 years of age. 192 subjects. Data used in PLOS Bio paper, Contribution of Network Organization and Integration to the development of Cognitive Control
Download: http://devrsfmri_2015.projects.nitrc.org...
software.license: Open Data Commons Open Database License (ODbL)
